archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.3.8b: b) stored on physical media, to prevent unauthorised access in the event backups are lost or stolen in transit to an alternative location, such as an off-site storage facility.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
